mapper.select: select replyboard.no no, title, content, hit, to_char(reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') regDate, user_no userNo, name, group_no groupNo, order_no orderNo, depth from replyboard, users where users.no = user_no order by no desc
mapper.insert: insert into replyboard values(seq_reply_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, TO_DATE(#{regDate},'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), ${userNo}, seq_reply_no.currval, 1, 0)
